channel.title: [317 Delta] Character file gets reset [317 Delta]
channel.description: When ever i log in, my character file in the character folder gets reset. It only saves until my next login. Im expecting its set to make a new account EVERY time, how can i change it to the FIRST time only? thanks! EDIT: I just noticed theres a file for the original owner of the source (Demise) in no folder, just out in the open with client.java and what-not..do i have to do that with mine? and then do that with everybody else who makes an account on my server? :(?

item.title: [317 Delta] Character file gets reset [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

im using demise [delta], and it does save, however it re-creates the file everytime I log in, which is probably a save malfunction of some kind.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 Delta] Character file gets reset [317 Delta]

item.title: [317 Delta] Character file gets reset [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

rangadanger7:

ok so i log in for first time, i do some stuff, test out the server a bit, and log out with owner / all 99s / all items and what-not. Then, i go back to log in, and b00m my account is suddenly reset back to the spawn point for new acc’s with all my stuff gone. It simply re-creates my account everytime i log in…

Oh… My post above was irrelevant then. You might be having a source with no player saving. What base would you be using mate?

Read full topic
